topic.title: EMS Cardiac Arrest Event Section - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.14"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67799-7" EMS cardiac arrest event Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10134)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Cardiac Arrest Event" (CONF:10937)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10939)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Cardiac Arrest (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.27)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67799-7" EMS cardiac arrest event Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10134)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Cardiac Arrest Event" (CONF:10937)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10939)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Cardiac Arrest (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.27)
